The company was formed in 2003 as the result of a merger between developers Digital Eclipse and ImaginEngine. In 2005, Backbone merged with The Collective to form Foundation 9 Entertainment.
data.text:
ABOUT THE GAME STUDIO

About Backbone Entertainment

Backbone Entertainment was an American video game developer based in Emeryville, California. The company was formed in 2003 as the result of a merger between developers Digital Eclipse and ImaginEngine. In 2005, Backbone merged with The Collective to form Foundation 9 Entertainment.

FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS

For more help you can read our Frequently Asked Questions or contact us.

What is their history and background?

Backbone Entertainment was founded in 2003, and have been around for 21 years. They have created a total of 0 video games for 0 different platforms in collaboration with 0 other game studios.

Do they have any upcoming titles?

We don't have any announced upcoming titles on file for Backbone Entertainment. As soon as we know about any we'll add them in here!

What companies have they often worked with?

Backbone Entertainment has not worked with any other game studios as far as we know, when we find some we'll add them in here.

What is their official website?

Unfortunately, we don't have a website on file for Backbone Entertainment - there is a chance this game studio does not currently have a website.

Do they have any job openings or career opportunities?

Unfortunately, we don't have a job openings page on file for Backbone Entertainment - there is still a chance this game studio is hiring; feel free to check their website and social channels for more information.

How many video games have they released?

We don't have any released titles on file for Backbone Entertainment. As soon as we know about any we'll add them in here!

How do I report out-of-date/incorrect details or submit edits?

If you would like to report out-of-date or incorrect information about a game studio please contact us and we will investigate further. For any page edit requests please also get in touch and we will get our team to update accordingly.

SHARE THIS PAGE WITH OTHERS

Spread the word about Backbone Entertainment with friends, family & others.
